articles.title: Children in Europe and the US are mysteriously coming down with a strange liver disease - Interesting Engineering
articles.description: Young kids in the United Kingdom, Ireland, Spain, and the United States have been coming down with a mysterious liver disease that does not stem from hepatitis A, B, C, D, and E. Doctors are baffled.
